m_szDocTitle: Japan has more electric car charging stations than gas stations
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Japan has more electric car charging stations than gas stations 0 Tibi Puiu While most of the world is sluggish about EVs, Japan seems to be light years ahead. The island state’s pro-electric car incentives have paid off and it’s never been easier for a Japanese to drive an electric car. Officially, there are now more charging stations than gas stations in the country. The biggest problems the market has with EVs have to do with price, autonomy and infrastructure.
